        public Lobby(int waitingTime,

        Constructor for Lobby.
        Parameters:
        waitingTime - is the waiting time after two players join the waiting room.
        turnTime - is the time limit for each player's turn.

        Creates a single player match.
        Parameters:
        name - is the player's username.
        difficulty - is the player's chosen difficulty for the current match.
        socketOut - represents the object output stream used to communicate with that player's view

      • reconnect

        public void reconnect(java.lang.String name)
        Puts a previously disconnected player's connection status to CONNECTED and notifies the reconnection to all the other players.
        Parameters:
        name - is the username of the player to reconnect.

      • transferAllData

        public void transferAllData(java.lang.String name)
        Used after a player's reconnection. Transfers all the current game data.
        Parameters:
        name - is the username of the reconnected player.

      • observeMatchRemote

        public void observeMatchRemote(java.lang.String username,
                               MatchObserver observer,
                               boolean single)
        Adds the current player's view to the match observers.
        Parameters:
        username - is the player's username.
        observer - receives notifies from Match.
        single - is true if the player's in a single player match, false otherwise.
